content: “Yet You Have Not Returned to Me”
Who exploit the poor, who oppress the needy,
And say to their husbands, “Bring now, that we may drink!”
The Lord  has sworn by His holiness,
“For behold, the days are coming upon you
When they will take you away with  hooks,
And the last of you with fish hooks.
One in front of the other,
And you will be hurled to Harmon,” declares the .
